item.title: Data Manipulation in R
item.description: Data Manipulation in R is now generally available on Amazon. All book links will attempt geo-targeting so you end up at the right Amazon. Prices are in USD as most readers are American and the price will be the equivalent in local currency. Data Manipulation in R is the second book in my R Fundamentals series that takes folks from no programming knowledge through to an experienced R user.
